line.text: Why is my verse so barren of new pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So far from variation or quick change
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Why with the time do I not glance aside
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To new-found methods and to compounds strange
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Why write I still all one ever the same
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And keep invention in a noted weed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That every word doth almost tell my name
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Showing their birth and where they did proceed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O know sweet love I always write of you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And you and love are still my argument
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So all my best is dressing old words new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Spending again what is already spent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For as the sun is daily new and old
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So is my love still telling what is told
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
